sources.title: Killer Dill
sources.description: Door-to-door salesman Johnny Dill, the exact double of a notorious gangster, finds himself struck between the forces of good and evil. You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Killer Dill
sources.description: Door-to-door salesman Johnny Dill, the exact double of a notorious gangster, finds himself struck between the forces of good and evil.

sources.title: Killer Dill (1947) [Comedy] [Crime]
sources.description:
"Killer Dill" is an American film directed by Lewis D. Collins. The movie is about the Door-to-door salesman Johnny Dill, an exact double of a notorious gangster, who finds himself struck between the forces of good and evil.

---

Directed by Lewis D. Collins, produced by Max M. King, written by Alan Friedman (story) and John O'Dea (writer), starring Stuart Erwin as Johnny 'Killer' Dill, Anne Gwynne as Judy Parker, Frank Albertson as William T. Allen, Mike Mazurki as Little Joe, Milburn Stone as Maboose, Dorothy Granger as Millie Gardner, Anthony Warde as Louie Moroni, Dewey Robinson as McGowan (house detective), , Ben Welden as Big Nick Moroni, Julie Gibson as Joan (model), Shirley Hunter as Gloria, Lola Jensen as Other model (with Joan
Margaret Zane as Girl with Gloria) and Stanley Ross as Mushnose.

---

Source: "Killer Dill" Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia. Wikimedia Foundation, Inc.. 4 April 2013. Web. 29 May 2013. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Killer_Dill.

If you like this movie and our channel, please subscribe: https://goo.gl/0qDmXe

sources.title: Killer Dill (1947) STU ERWIN
sources.description:
Stars: Stuart Erwin, Anne Gwynne, Frank Albertson 
Director: Lewis D. Collins

In this classic comedy, after a notorious Prohibition gangster murders a rival, a milquetoast door-to-door salesman (who happens to be his exact double) finds himself in a real pickle --stuck between the forces of good.and the minions of evil.

metadata.Plot: Lingerie salesman Johnny Dill, thought to be a killer gangster, finds himself struck between the forces of good and evil.
metadata.Actors: Stuart Erwin, Anne Gwynne, Frank Albertson
